winter_mode.description:
Enable the **winter mode switch** to get your home ready for winter! ❄️

This adds a switch entity that you can use in automations. You can manually add it to your dashboard.
winter_mode.disable_confirmation: This will remove the winter mode switch entity. You can bring it back at any time in labs settings.
winter_mode.enable_confirmation: This will add a winter mode switch entity. You can turn this off at any time in labs settings.
winter_mode.name: Winter mode

set_theme.description: Sets the default theme Home Assistant uses. Can be overridden by a user.
set_theme.name: Set the default theme
